summary.span: 包含一些类，这些类允许你自定义从 Web Services 描述语言 (WSDL) 文档生成的代码。

span.span: Contains classes that allow you to customize the code generated from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用代码生成功能的一个示例是 Visual Studio 的 " **添加 Web 引用** " 对话框。One example of using the code generation feature is the **Add Web Reference** dialog box of Visual Studio. 另一个示例是 [ ( # A0) 的 Web 服务描述语言工具 ](/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/7h3ystb6(v=vs.100))。Another example is the [Web Services Description Language Tool (Wsdl.exe)](/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/7h3ystb6(v=vs.100)).
